Articles.Content:
This started as research notes for a space station build but since we don't seem to have an easy way of finding space station parts, I thought I'd share. This is by no means complete, nor do I claim 100% accuracy. If you have any suggestions or corrections, please post them in the thread below!

[TR]

Change Log:

  • 2014-09-01: First version.
  • 2014-09-02: Added Tantares, Salyut, Skylab; added dependencies and compatibilities if known.
  • 2014-09-07: Added Davon supply mod.
  • 2014-09-11: Added MunSeeker Greenhouses.

Edited September 12, 2014 by LitaAlto
Awesome list, I haven't heard of many of these. I just snagged some inline lights.
Would it be possible to list dependencies/supported 3rd-party mods for the sake of completeness?
[MOD - I've moved this to General Add-on Affairs, since this is a curated list rather than an actual release thread]

Would it be possible to list dependencies/supported 3rd-party mods for the sake of completeness?

Probably. Dependencies are a little weird since some mods come with their dependencies (but might have outdated copies) and others don't. I'll see if I have time to work on that this week.

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/88383

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/86243

Edited September 2, 2014 by raidernick

Tantares has Salyut parts.
http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/88383

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/86243

Thanks, will add these later--hopefully today, but I'm having video card issues so we'll see how quickly I can add these....
Would this make more sense on a dedicated website, or maybe a spreadsheet on Google Drive? I'm thinking about the long-term viability of this resource.

Here's the science lab from interstellar but with better internals

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/43840-Hab-Hub-%28and-other-strange-things%29

These crosswalks are pretty neat as well

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/40207-Crosswalk-narrow-passageway?highlight=crosswalk

Asteroid cities also has a greenhouse

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/79675

and so does LLL

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/24906-WIP-LLL-Lack-Luster-Labs-LLL-12-2-10MAY2014-SXT-17a-30AUG2014-KSC-v3?highlight=lack

large structural components...

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/34664-Large-Structural-Station-Components-20-Compatible-Release-Thread?highlight=udk_lethal_d0se

I just wish that escapadie systems mod didnt die, i want to build my own stanford toruses out of fustek components and other bits and pieces, but need an angled wedge part to put in between the sections to create the curve...

Buzzou, thanks for the links! I've seen some of these before but was waiting on updates--maybe I shouldn't bother though. I track version info after all....

Does anyone know where I can see a full set of photos of LLL's stuff?
